post.body: I SOOOOO want to know. I'm not patient about giving or receiving gifts. I'm dying to tell everyone what I got them :)
MIssing you and the fam this holiday. Have a merry Christmas and give the boys love from us all.
Try the local farmers market. Soemtimes they have livestock . . . LOL
You brat!!! Not fair :)
Sounds yummy!
is curious to know what @pmpnathan is making for Christmas breakfast??? Should we head over there?
is trying to get gift hints out of the kids who went shopping with daddy. They're not budging. Ev trained them well.
THe big kids are watching Lord of the Rings with Daddy. THen present opening with Grandparents this afternoon.
Just finished with the wrapping. Waiting on a few things in teh mail tomorrow, then we'll be done!
Renews my belief in the human spirit.
The kids Christmas presents from Amazon.com were delivered 5 miles away. The man that lived there mapquested our house and delivered them
Cleaning house today.
Is excited about @pistachio's project
p$2 @wellwishes for CharityWater to save lives. What can 2 do http://bit.ly/13xKO You can tweet donate via @tipjoy too
Just finished (I think) with my kid Christmas shopping.
Me thinks I'm the only one still up. Can't sleep . . . :(
I'll stop the world and melt with you . . .
Have had Adobe lightroom for quite a while. Just now taking the time to play around in it. That program is friggin awesome!
DO you shoot in RAW?? It's taking up so much space on my drive and it's a pain to convert to .jpg for the blog, scrappin, etc.
Trying to find my mojo. Any ideas on where it was last?
